item.title: Shortcut Cocktail - The Bellini
item.description: It was the last weekend of our 2-week holiday break and I knew Monday was going to be rough.

item.title: Shortcut Cocktail - The Caipirinha
item.description: If you haven’t already experienced the sweet bliss of a Caipirinha (heeeeey kai-purr-reen-yah - ‘aight), I highly recommend it.
